reviewText: Good quality.  Great movie for boys and girls
Great movie! My kids loved it!
I bought this for my grandson and he watches it at least 3 times a week, and it is educational too not just fun to watch.
My little guy loves this video! The show isn't on TV anymore in my area, so I've had to buy a couple of these DVDs for him to watch.
My 2 year old son and 3 year old daughter love this show! If your kids like Mike the Knight buy this!
My two year old just loved the tape and the character.  Went out and got him some of the toys and the books and he loved all of them
Cute. Mike does not listen well, not the best lesson but that is me being nitpicky.
My youngest son absolutely loves pirates because they have swords so i ordered this movie and he loved it, now he wants to be a knight!

This show is ok. My 2-year-old doesn't seem to be taking to it, but I might try again when he is older. I think the idea is cute, but it does bother me that Mike talks with a whiney drawl. Also, the show tries to teach kids little lessons, but the lesson isn't understood until the very end. So, for the first 3/4 of the show, Mike or other characters are exhibiting behavior I don't really want my kid imitating. I wish the characters would learn their lessons earlier or just have nice, fun adventures without being quarrelsome, pouty, selfish, or whatever the case may be.

My girls love Mike the Knight. This DVD contains six great episodes from the Nick Jr. cartoon. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD:

1. The Smiley Treasure
2. The Tricky Trail
3. The Buried Treasure
4. The Wizard's Treasure
5. The Jewel of Glendragon
6. The Special Knightly Things (Bonus Episode)

Bonus Features:
1. Huzzah for Glendragon Music Video
2. Mike the Knight Theme Song
My son loves Mike the Knight. The stories are cute and often have a good lesson.
